intro: Lasiospermum hirsutum, commonly known as the hairy lasiospermum, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. Its fruit is a capsule that contains numerous tiny seeds. Lasiospermum hirsutum is often found in rocky or arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions.
